para.para: This document is the reference guide for Spring Hadoop project (SHDP). It explains the relationship between the Spring framework and Hadoop as well as related projects such as Spring Batch and Spring Integration. The first part describes the integration wtih the Spring framework to define the base concepts and semantics of the integration and how they can be use effectively. The second part describes how you can build upon these base concepts and create workflow based solutions provided by the integration with Spring Batch.
